statement.name: INSERT_SMAKNP
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smaknp( codcia, grpknp, nomknp, npqknp, vlrknp, tpoknp, exepgs, klcknp, codpqk, codknp, codtrc, delknp, codevn, cxcpqk, sqlbkr, ideknp) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAKNP
statement.sql: UPDATE smaknp SET codcia=?, grpknp=?, nomknp=?, npqknp=?, vlrknp=?, tpoknp=?, exepgs=?, klcknp=?, codpqk=?, codtrc=?, delknp=?, codevn=?, cxcpqk=?, sqlbkr=? , codknp=? WHERE ideknp=?
